markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> command, envision, Interact;     **Effect** The _elder sign_ casts [_dimensional lock_](/Spells.aspx?ID=71), though it wards against travel by only eldritch creatures. Each time the _elder sign_ casts _dimensional lock_ in this way, the previous _dimensional lock_ spell ends.
name: command, envision, Interact
